text: Cave of the Living Dead () is a 1964 German / Yugoslav horror film directed by Ákos Ráthonyi. == Cast == * Adrian Hoven - Insp. Frank Dorin * Erika Remberg - Maria, the Professor's Assistant * Carl Möhner - The Village Doctor * Wolfgang Preiss - Prof. von Adelsberg * Karin Field - Karin Schumann * Emmerich Schrenk - Thomas - the Deaf One * John Kitzmiller - John - Black Servant == References == == External links == * Category:1964 films Category:1964 horror films Category:German horror films Category:West German films Category:Yugoslav films Category:Mad scientist films Category:Vampires in film Category:German supernatural horror films Category:1960s supernatural horror films Category:Films directed by Ákos Ráthonyi
title: Cave of the Living Dead
